about_the_game:
Beastly Tactics: Rock Paper Scissors is a turn-based role-playing game where you embody a cunning animal, facing off against others in strategic battles. Each fight is resolved through intuition and deception using the classic Rock, Paper, Scissors, but with a tactical twist. During combat, you'll have access to three key actions to outsmart your opponent:

  • Guess: Try to predict which choice your opponent will make.
  • Bluff: Send false signals about your own choice to influence theirs.
  • Deal: Attempt to force a tie, negotiating a temporary balance.

After each battle, the experience you gain will help level up these abilities, giving you better chances in future duels. Level up, hone your strategy, and prove you’re the smartest in the animal kingdom!
